item.description:
The World MoneyShow Toronto


October 20 - 22, Wednesday through Friday, 2010

The following material is from their web site.
The World MoneyShow is committed to delivering in-depth education and specific, expert advice required to help you trade more confidently and profitably.

If you are an active trader, The World MoneyShow has workshops dedicated to providing you with access to leading trading experts who will show you their profitable strategies, techniques, trading set-ups, and much more. Don't miss out on this opportunity to register free to attend The World MoneyShow Toronto, meet the experts, and take your trading to a whole new level! For traders, all it takes is one new strategy or technique to make the entire trip worthwhile.

The World MoneyShow Toronto will offer over 100 sessions featuring keynote presentations, interactive workshops, live trading demonstrations, and spirited panel discussions. Visit our state-of-the-art Exhibit Hall, where you can meet face to face with representatives from more than 70 global companies and gather a wealth of up-to-the-minute information on the latest trading products and services. Free samples and literature abound, giving you the chance to take home what you learn and study them at your leisure, so you can make smarter investment decisions.

In addition to the unmatched opportunity to ask questions of the world’s foremost investing and trading experts face to face, the conference provides a forum to share with fellow attendees and learn their strategies for trading various markets.

The one event this fall that will be your one-stop resource for the most comprehensive education, efficient research, and valuable advice is The World MoneyShow Toronto, October 20-22. So, we hope that you’ll join us there.

Free Registration here
secure.moneyshow.com/msc/TOMS/registration.asp?sid=TOMS10&newReg=t&scode=019778

group.name: Boston Traders Meetup to Teach/Learn Trading Strategies
